name: The point G. How to find?
name_original: The point G. How to find?
description:
The two main characters Sasha and Alex meet at the bar. After long memories and a couple of glasses, they decide to go home to Alex.
So they have a romantic relationship. But can Sasha forget his past love and build a new relationship? or is it just a one-time, stormy night?Features
  • Visual novel game with sexy content;
  • А story full of emotions;
  • Relaxing music;
  • Surprising ending;
  • Steam achievements.
